content:
Check:
  any:
    - all:
        - name: QNAM
          operator: is_not_unique_set
          value:
            - USUBJID
    - all:
        - name: QNAM
          operator: is_not_unique_set
          value:
            - POOLID
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.254
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: There may be only be one record in a SUPP-- dataset with the same QNAM
  value within USUBJID or POOLID.
Outcome:
  Message: Duplicate value of the combination of USUBJID or POOLID with QNAM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '254'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: supp--.xpt, Supplemental Qualifiers for (domain name)
                  - Relationship Datasets. One record per supplemental qualifier per
                  related parent domain record(s), Tabulation.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: '8.3'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - RELATIONSHIP
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SUPP--

json.Description: There may be only be one record in a SUPP-- dataset with the same QNAM value within USUBJID or POOLID.

Outcome.Message: Duplicate value of the combination of USUBJID or POOLID with QNAM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: supp--.xpt, Supplemental Qualifiers for (domain name) - Relationship Datasets. One record per supplemental qualifier per related parent domain record(s), Tabulation.
